title: China's AI chip firms lead 2025 top 50 ranking ― report
description: BEIJING — A report ranking the top 50 Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) companies has shown that enterprises specializing in AI chips emerged as the most notable performers in 2025, taking seven of the top 10 spots.
content:
BEIJING — A report ranking the top 50 Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) companies has shown that enterprises specializing in AI chips emerged as the most notable performers in 2025, taking seven of the top 10 spots.

title: Why Women Are More Wary Of Artificial Intelligence Than Men, Study Reveals
description: A new study finds women view artificial intelligence as riskier than men due to higher risk aversion and greater exposure to AI related job disruptions, highlighting the need for inclusive AI policies.
content: Women tend to view artificial intelligence as riskier than men, according to a peer reviewed study published in PNAS Nexus. The research suggests this difference is linked to higher risk aversion among women and greater personal exposure to potential... [1519 chars]

title: Palantir CEO Says AI to Make Large-Scale Immigration Obsolete
description: Artificial intelligence will displace so many jobs that it will eliminate the need for mass immigration, according to Palantir Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Alex Karp.
content:
Artificial intelligence will displace so many jobs that it will eliminate the need for mass immigration, according to Palantir Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Alex Karp .
“There will be more than enough jobs for the citizens of your nation,... [275 chars]

title: Women treat AI with greater skepticism than men do, study suggests
description: Women perceive artificial intelligence (AI) as riskier than men do, according to a study. Beatrice Magistro and colleagues hypothesized that women are both more exposed to risk from AI and are more averse to risk in general than men. Their work was published in PNAS Nexus.
content: Women perceive artificial intelligence (AI) as riskier than men do, according to a study. Beatrice Magistro and colleagues hypothesized that women are both more exposed to risk from AI and are more averse to risk in general than men. Their work was p... [1748 chars]

title: Ukraine to share wartime combat data with allies to help train AI
description: KYIV, Jan 20 - Ukraine will establish a system allowing its allies to train their artificial intelligence models on Kyiv's valuable combat data collected throughout the nearly four-year war with Russia, newly appointed Defence Minister Mykhailo Fedorov has said. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: How AI Is Powering The Next Wave Of Retail Transformation
description: Across the retail industry, artificial intelligence is no longer viewed as an experimental capability or a future-state ambition.
content: Across the retail industry, artificial intelligence is no longer viewed as an experimental capability or a future-state ambition. It’s become connective tissue linking data, decision-making and growth. Nowhere is this shift more visible than in retai... [8224 chars]

title: Chris Pratt and Rebecca Ferguson on pushing boundaries with courtroom drama 'Mercy': 'AI should aid humans, not be an alternative to humans'
description: In 'Mercy', Chris Pratt and Rebecca Ferguson explore the implications of artificial intelligence in the courtroom, highlighting its potential and risks as a tool versus a replacement for human judgment. Set to release on January 23, the film offers a gripping multi-genre narrative.
content: Chris Pratt and costar Rebecca Ferguson are venturing into bold new territory with their upcoming film 'Mercy', a thriller that takes AI to the courtroom. Ahead of the film's release, the lead stars got candid about their latest outing and also share... [2463 chars]

title: Rebecca Ferguson on playing an AI judge in Mercy, “AI is a fantastic tool, but it should be just that
description: As artificial intelligence becomes increasingly embedded in everyday decision-making, the upcoming sci-fi thriller Mercy explores the consequences of placing judicial authority in the hands of technology. Rebecca Ferguson, who plays an AI judge named Judge Maddox in the film, says the premise feels uncomfortably close to the world we are already living in. “Playing JudgeRead More
